text: Roger Patrick "Ernie" Hunt (17 March 1943 â€“ 20 June 2018) was an English footballer. He played in the Football League for Swindon Town, Wolverhampton Wanderers, Everton, Coventry City, Doncaster Rovers and Bristol City, and for the Los Angeles Wolves in the United Soccer Association. At international level, he was capped three times for the England under-23 team. Hunt died in Gloucestershire on 20 June 2018 of complications from Alzheimer's disease, aged 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * League stats at Neil Brown's site * Stats and photo at Sporting Heroes Category:1943 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:English footballers Category:Bristol City F.C. players Category:Everton F.C. players Category:People from Swindon Category:Wolverhampton Wanderers F.C. players
title: Ernie Hunt
